description:
Get out of the winter funk and into the summer groove with perfectly primped and primed legs. Remington's Beauty Shave Cordless Shaver is the perfect hair removing tool to get you back into the summer mood. Boasting a full-size foil that flexes to the contour of your body for ultra-close shaving and dual trimmers to ensure that no hair is left behind. The 100% waterproof design means you can use it in both the bath and shower with the angled head designed to ensure maximum skin contact for a fast and comfortable shave.
Product Features:

Stainless steel blades
Stainless steel foils
Angled head ensures maximum skin contact for a fast shave
Dual trimmers ensure no hairs are missed
100% Waterproof
Battery operated (2x AAA batteries required)
Hang loop to keep your shaver handy in the shower
name: Remington Women's Beauty Shave Cordless Shaver 1EA
